title: Illuminati Grandmaster Issues Serious Warnings to FED. Skull&Bon
description:
2008-05-18 Illuminati Grandmaster Leo Lyon Zagami Issues Serious Warnings to the Federal Reserve Bank, 

Skull and Bones, and the criminal Norwegian Government

The former ex-Illuminati prodigy Leo Lyon Zagami was until recently living a relatively peaceful life with 

his Muslim wife and children in Oslo Norway. On having been repeatedly arrested by the Norwegian 

authorities and on suggestion from his wife, to protect himself and his family Zagami started to run an 

informative website called Illuminaticonfessions.com (now defunct), which took a big swing at the illegal 

practices of the Vatican-led NWO and corrupt esoteric branch of the Illuminati (Satanism). Due to 

purposefully malignant manipulation and interference by the devious two-faced Jesuit Thomas Michel starting 

in May 2007 however his marriage with Fatma Suslu, a descendent of the Prophet Mohammad, was callously 

destroyed and Leo was briefly held under arrest on trumped up charges. Upon his release Zagami was forced 

to sign a document in which he was banned from seeing his only biological child, Isak Rumi. In addition his 

two computers, containing years of Zagami&#039;s work, as well as a couple of cellphones were confiscated in 

what seems to be a blatantly obvious illegal seizure.

According to Zagami, there&#039;s no reason the Norwegian Authorities could jusfify banning Leo from seeing his 
son. In the past, Zagami, on order from the Monte Carlo executive masonic committee, had investigated the 
practices of the Norwegian Freemasons in relationship with the notorious Church burnings of the 90s. It 
would seem that the satanic Norwegian Freemasons are now striking back at Zagami by seeing to it that the 
illegal ban Leo was forced to sign, is now being enforced through the Norwegian authorities. Needless to 
say, the fact that Leo is illegally being obstructed from seeing his son is making him very, very angry.  

As head of the Ordo Illuminatorum Universalis (European Illuminati) and leader of a break-away faction of 
the Knights Templar and high level Freemasons based in Monte Carlo, Zagami is now back into the &#039;game&#039;: 
stronger, more aggressive and more pissed off than ever. He not only is determined to break the illegal ban 
keeping him from seeing his son, his ambitions stretch much further than that: he is determined to rid the 
planet from Satanism so that humanity is finally able to meet its next phase of evolution. With all the 
corruption this planet has seen for thousands of years, it would seem about high time this noble aim be 
realized indeed.

For more information regarding Leo Lyon Zagami, a man on a mission, please visit:

Yesterday I received a quite perplexing and alarming Skype call from Leo in which he gave me the most 
recent developments in his struggle against the Satanist thugs that have a selfish and suffocating 
strangle-hold on humanity. 

The key items in his short but very compelling and robust statement:
----------------------------------------------

- Zagami&#039;s Email account ( <a class="__cf_email__" href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" data-cfemail="29454c4650465c474e18101010695048414646074a4644">[email&#160;protected]</a><script cf-hash='f9e31' type="text/javascript">

No valid reason 

given by yahoo for this blatant act of censorship was provided. 

Upon trying to access his account Zagami was met with the following message:

"Unusual Activity Detected
To protect you, your account has been suspended from sending, saving, and receiving mail for up to 48 
hours"

Zagami goes on to state:
- The wellknown Federal Reserve Bank fighters Ed and Elaine Brown had, moments before Zagami called in, 
been arrested along with the security chief Rino Gonzalez. According to Zagami the US Marshalls, FBI, ITF 
were responsible for this unjust arrest. 

- The Militia in the US is uniting and making preparations to visit George W Bush in &#039;his crypt in the 
Skull and Bones headquarters&#039;. Zagami wants an &#039;official investigation by his Knights Templar into their 
priory&#039;. The Skull and Bones will be officially accused by Zagami for practises of Satanism and other 
Diableries. Zagami states quite plainly: the Federal Reserve Bank, Skull and Bones, and the Neo-Cons &#039;are 
criminals&#039;.

- A political agent of Zagami working in Norway stated to him that: the Norwegian authorities (PST and 
Norwegian Military Intelligence) want to arrest him once he&#039;s back in Norway because he has exposed the 
prime-minister together with Zagami&#039;s successor Khaqan Khan to the Committee of Hope in Oslo, a public 
forum founded by Zagami himself that aims at informing its members of the many criminal facets of the NWO.

-Zagami states forcefully that the &#039;Norwegian authorities have acted as criminals against me!&#039;. If they 
continue like this Zagami will do &#039;a coupe in their country and unleash chaos in Norway.&#039; To this end, he 
will deploy his loyal Pakistani A&B gangs in Oslo and &#039;start detonating themselves.&#039; 

-Zagami goes on by stressing that Jens Stoltenberg, the Norwegian Prime-minister, has to officially 
apologize to Zagami now, &#039;otherwise he will be killed!!&#039;. Zagami will not tolerate the prospect of getting 
arrested again in Norway. &#039;Shame on Norway!&#039;. Zagami is giving an &#039;ultimatum to Norway; If they touch 
Khaqan Khan again... they will have a lot of problems out there.&#039; If the ultimatum is not met, Zagami &#039;will 
destroy their government, start civil riots, and make a revolution in Norway.&#039;

-By threatening to arrest Zagami upon his return back in Norway, he cannot see his son again.&#039;The Norwegian 

PST, the Norwegian Police, Norwegian government, the Norwegian Freemasons are criminals and should be 

sentenced in the European Court at The Hague.&#039; Zagami was arrested and tortured many times by the Norwegian 

government and it is quite clear from Zagami&#039;s strong words that he will not stand for these kind of 

threats any longer. 

Zagami leaves little doubt as to his pending counter-move:
"These people are acting like criminals against me and I&#039;m not gonna tolerate it any longer. I&#039;m not gonna 
be arrested in Norway, I&#039;m gonna be in Norway and they will have to give me the Nobel Peace Prize otherwise 

he&#039;s gonna shoot the Prime Minister in his f*cking head!" If they continue to threaten him, Zagami 
emphatically states that the Prime Minister of Norway Jens Stoltenberg will be killed by his assassins.

To further make clear that he is not playing around, Zagami passionately exclaims:
"They don&#039;t want me to see my son, HOW DARE THEY, HOW DARE THEY!!"

-------------------------

Zagami&#039;s message to the Norwegian government should be quite clear now:
Do not mess around with Leo Zagami, head of the European Illuminati, and let him see his son without making 

callous threats to (again) arrest and detain him with no legal cause whatsoever. 

This alarming piece of communication was brough to you by a considerably flabberghasted Phil/ephilution. 

However, yours truly might seem a bit shaken but he&#039;s not quite stirred. Therefore:
POWER TO THE PEOPLE!! AWAY WITH SATANISM!!
